title: Peer Coaching-Based Customized Professional Development Program for In-Service Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Mathematics pedagogy experience and digital device utilization skills
context.additional_context: Short-term intensive course for corporate in-house trainers to strengthen mathematics instruction competencies, offering flexible learning environments via mobile devices and LMS

learning_goals: Participating teachers can derive two or more lesson design improvements by reflecting on peer feedback
Through personalized learning analytics, teachers can identify three or more professional development areas and establish action plans
Learners can participate in peer coaching activities at least three times per week via a mobile platform and achieve over 85% proficiency in formative assessments
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
